citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25a and
12:21p on 16-JAN-20.
At 10:25a ACI Bartels arrived at the facility. The drive was gated. ACI Bartels honked the horn and called the
numbers on file. A licensee contacted ACI Bartels by phone. They stated that they wouldn't be home for a couple
hours.
At 12:21p ACI Bartels returned to the facility. ACI Bartels attempted to reach the licensee by phone. The licensee
stated they would not be home for a couple more hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25a and
12:21p on 16-JAN-20.
At 10:25a ACI Bartels arrived at the facility.  The drive was gated.  ACI Bartels honked the horn and called the
numbers on file.  A licensee contacted ACI Bartels by phone.  They stated that they wouldn't be home for a couple
hours.
At 12:21p ACI Bartels returned to the facility.  ACI Bartels attempted to reach the licensee by phone.  The licensee
stated they would not be home for a couple more hours.
